Typealiases.html#/s:5ASAPP27ASAPPRequest.name: ASAPPRequestContextProvider
Typealiases.html#/s:5ASAPP27ASAPPRequest.abstract: A type of closure that returns [String: Any]. The dictionary needs to contain the key-value pair ASAPP.AUTH_KEY_ACCESS_TOKEN: authToken where authToken is the user’s authentication token.

Typealiases.html#/s:5ASAPP23ASAPPAppCall.name: ASAPPAppCallbackHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:5ASAPP23ASAPPAppCall.abstract: A Void closure type that takes a deep link’s name as a String and the deep link’s metadata as a [String: Any]?.

Enums/ASAPPNavBarButtonStyle.html#/c:@M@.name: bubble
Enums/ASAPPNavBarButtonStyle.html#/c:@M@.abstract: The button will appear as text inside a bubble shape.

Enums/ASAPPNavBarButtonStyle.html#/c:@M@.name: text
Enums/ASAPPNavBarButtonStyle.html#/c:@M@.abstract: The button will appear as text without a background.

Enums/ASAPPLogLevel.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@E@A.name: info
Enums/ASAPPLogLevel.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@E@A.abstract: The highest level. Prints everything, including very long messages.

Enums/ASAPPSegue.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@E@ASAP.name: push
Enums/ASAPPSegue.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@E@ASAP.abstract: Push the view controller onto the navigation stack.

Enums/ASAPPSegue.html.name: ASAPPSegue
Enums/ASAPPSegue.html.abstract: Represents the kind of segue used by ASAPPButton to show the SDK’s view controller.

Enums/ASAPPLogLevel.html.name: ASAPPLogLevel
Enums/ASAPPLogLevel.html.abstract: Represents the verbosity level of the debugging log.

Enums/ASAPPNavBarButtonStyle.html.name: ASAPPNavBarButtonStyle
Enums/ASAPPNavBarButtonStyle.html.abstract: Represents the style of button in the SDK’s navigation bar.

Classes/ASAPPNavBarButtonImages.html#/c:.name: close
Classes/ASAPPNavBarButtonImages.html#/c:.abstract: The close button appears in the top right when the view controller is presented modally. Defaults to an ✕.

Classes/ASAPPNavBarButtonImages.html#/c:.name: back
Classes/ASAPPNavBarButtonImages.html#/c:.abstract: The back button appears in the top left when the view controller is pushed into a navigation stack. Defaults to a ‹.

Classes/ASAPPNavBarButtonImages.html#/c:.name: ask
Classes/ASAPPNavBarButtonImages.html#/c:.abstract: The ask button appears in the chat view when not chatting with an agent.

Classes/ASAPPNavBarButtonImages.html#/c:.name: backToChat
Classes/ASAPPNavBarButtonImages.html#/c:.abstract: The back to chat button appears in the predictive view.

Classes/ASAPPNavBarButtonImages.html#/c:.name: end
Classes/ASAPPNavBarButtonImages.html#/c:.abstract: The end chat button appears in the chat view when chatting with an agent.

Classes/ASAPPButton.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.name: layoutSubviews()
Classes/ASAPPButton.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.abstract: Lays out subviews. Just as with UIView.layoutSubviews(), you should not call this method directly.

Classes/ASAPPButton.html#/s:5ASAPP11ASAP.name: triggerTap()
Classes/ASAPPButton.html#/s:5ASAPP11ASAP.abstract: Simulates a tap on the button, displaying the SDK’s view controller.

Classes/ASAPPButtonColors.html#/c:@M@ASA.abstract: Creates an instance of ASAPPButtonColors with a background and text color. A highlighted background

Classes/ASAPPButtonColors.html#/c:@M@ASA.abstract: Creates an instance of ASAPPButtonColors with a background, text, and border color. A highlighted

Classes/ASAPPButtonColors.html#/c:@M@ASA.abstract: Creates an instance of ASAPPButtonColors with a background color. A highlighted and a disabled background

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: predictiveTitle
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The title for the predictive view. Overridden by ASAPPViews.predictiveTitle. Defaults to nil.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: predictiveBackToChatButton

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: predictiveWelcomeText

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: predictiveOtherSuggestions

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: predictiveInputPlaceholder

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: predictiveSendButton

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: predictiveNoConnectionText

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: connectionBannerConnected

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: connectionBannerConnecting
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text displayed in the chat view when a connection is being established.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: connectionBannerDisconnected
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text displayed in the chat view when there is no connection available.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: chatTitle
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The title for the chat view. Overridden by ASAPPViews.chatTitle. Defaults to nil.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: chatEmptyTitle
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text for the header displayed when there is no chat history.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: chatEmptyMessage
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text for the message displayed when there is no chat history.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: chatAskNavBarButton
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text for the navigation bar button that appears in the chat view when not chatting with an agent. When tapped, it shows the predictive view. Overridden by ASAPPNavBarButtonImages.ask.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: chatEndChatNavBarButton
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text for the navigation bar button that appears in the chat view when chatting with an agent. When tapped, it ends the chat. Overridden by ASAPPNavBarButtonImages.end.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: chatInputPlaceholder
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The placeholder text for the input field of the chat view.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: chatInputSend
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text for the send button of the chat view.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: secureScreenCoverText

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: requestErrorGenericFailureTitle

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: requestErrorGenericFailure

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: alertDismissButton

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: failureToLoadScreen

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: failureToLoadScreenReloadButton

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text for the close button displayed when a view could not load.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: requiredFieldEmptyMessage
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text displayed next to a required form field that was left empty.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: endChatConfirmationTitle

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: endChatConfirmationMessage

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: endChatConfirmationEndChatButton
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text for the confirmation button of the end chat alert.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: endChatConfirmationCancelButton
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text for the cancel button of the end chat alert.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: feedbackViewTitle
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The title for the feedback form.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: feedbackIssueResolutionPrompt

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: feedbackIssueResolutionYes

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: feedbackIssueResolutionNo

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: feedbackPrompt
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text prompting the user to leave feedback, shown as a placeholder in the text area.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: feedbackMissingRatingError
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text displayed when a rating was no chosen.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: feedbackSentSuccessMessage
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text displayed when the rating was sent successfully.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: requestErrorMessageNoConnection
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text displayed when a request can’t be sent because there is no connection available.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: modalViewCancelButton

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: modalViewSubmitButton

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.name: cameraPermissionsErrorTitle

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@ob.abstract: The text for the go-to-settings button of the alert shown when camera permission is not granted.

Classes/ASAPPColors.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.abstract: The color of text in navigation bar buttons with ASAPPNavBarButtonStyle.bubble.

Classes/ASAPPColors.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.name: backgroundPrimary

Classes/ASAPPColors.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.name: backgroundSecondary

Classes/ASAPPColors.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.name: separatorPrimary

Classes/ASAPPColors.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.name: separatorSecondary

Classes/ASAPPColors.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.name: controlSecondary

Classes/ASAPPColors.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.name: controlSelectedBackground
Classes/ASAPPColors.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.abstract: The color of the background of selected checkboxes and radio buttons.

Classes/ASAPPColors.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.name: positiveSelectedBackground

Classes/ASAPPColors.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.name: negativeSelectedBackground

Classes/ASAPPColors.html#/c:@M@ASAPP@obj.abstract: The color of text in navigation bar buttons in the predictive view with ASAPPNavBarButtonStyle.bubble.

Classes/ASAPPStyles.html#/c:@CM@ASAPP@ob.abstract: Applies a custom font family to per-app style presets.

Classes/ASAPPFontFamily.html#/c:@M@ASAPP.name: regular
Classes/ASAPPFontFamily.html#/c:@M@ASAPP.abstract: The second-lightest weight, used for body text.

Classes/ASAPPTextStyles.html#/c:@M@ASAPP.name: navTitle
Classes/ASAPPTextStyles.html#/c:@M@ASAPP.abstract: The style of the navigation bar title.

Classes/ASAPPTextStyles.html#/c:@M@ASAPP.name: predictiveHeader
Classes/ASAPPTextStyles.html#/c:@M@ASAPP.abstract: The style of the predictive view title. See ASAPPStrings.predictiveTitle.

Classes/ASAPPTextStyles.html#/c:@M@ASAPP.name: updateStyles(for:)
Classes/ASAPPTextStyles.html#/c:@M@ASAPP.abstract: Updates all text styles above with the given font family.

Classes/ASAPPNavBarStyles.html#/c:@M@ASA.name: buttonStyle
Classes/ASAPPNavBarStyles.html#/c:@M@ASA.abstract: The style of navigation bar buttons. Defaults to ASAPPNavBarButtonStyle.bubble.

Classes/ASAPPNavBarStyles.html#/c:@M@ASA.name: buttonImages
Classes/ASAPPNavBarStyles.html#/c:@M@ASA.abstract: The images used in navigation bar buttons.

Classes/ASAPPNavBarStyles.html#/c:@M@ASA.name: titlePadding
Classes/ASAPPNavBarStyles.html#/c:@M@ASA.abstract: The edge insets for the navigation bar title. Defaults to 8 on the sides.

Classes/ASAPPShapeStyles.html#/c:@M@ASAP.name: separatorStrokeWidth
Classes/ASAPPShapeStyles.html#/c:@M@ASAP.abstract: The width of the stroke of separators such as timestamp headers and chat bubble borders.

Classes/ASAPPShapeStyles.html#/c:@M@ASAP.name: primaryButtonsRounded
Classes/ASAPPShapeStyles.html#/c:@M@ASAP.abstract: Whether primary Component buttons have rounded corners.

Classes/ASAPPInputColors.html#/c:@M@ASAP.name: background
Classes/ASAPPInputColors.html#/c:@M@ASAP.abstract: The color of the background of the input area.

Classes/ASAPPInputColors.html#/c:@M@ASAP.name: placeholderText
Classes/ASAPPInputColors.html#/c:@M@ASAP.abstract: The color of the placeholder text, visible before anything has been typed.

Classes/ASAPPInputColors.html#/c:@M@ASAP.name: tint
Classes/ASAPPInputColors.html#/c:@M@ASAP.abstract: The tint color of the text area (used by the cursor).

Classes/ASAPPInputColors.html#/c:@M@ASAP.name: border
Classes/ASAPPInputColors.html#/c:@M@ASAP.abstract: The color of the border of the text area.

Classes/ASAPPInputColors.html#/c:@M@ASAP.name: secondaryButton
Classes/ASAPPInputColors.html#/c:@M@ASAP.abstract: The color of the media attachment button.

Classes/ASAPPViews.html#/s:5ASAPP10ASAPP.name: predictiveTitle
Classes/ASAPPViews.html#/s:5ASAPP10ASAPP.abstract: The title view displayed in the navigation bar when viewing the predictive input view. Overrides ASAPP.strings.predictiveTitle.

Classes/ASAPPNavBarButtonImage.html.name: ASAPPNavBarButtonImage
Classes/ASAPPNavBarButtonImage.html.abstract: Used to define an icon for a navigation bar button.

Classes/ASAPPInputColors.html.name: ASAPPInputColors
Classes/ASAPPInputColors.html.abstract: Used to configure the colors of text input area in the predictive view and chat view.

Classes/ASAPPTextStyles.html.name: ASAPPTextStyles
Classes/ASAPPTextStyles.html.abstract: Customizable text styles for various classes of text.

Classes/ASAPPFontFamily.html.name: ASAPPFontFamily
Classes/ASAPPFontFamily.html.abstract: Represents a font family used by default styles. Individual ASAPPTextStyles will override the font family given to ASAPPStyles.stylesForAppId(_:fontFamily:).

Classes/ASAPPStyles.html.name: ASAPPStyles
Classes/ASAPPStyles.html.abstract: Holds customizable styles and other visual SDK settings.

Classes/ASAPPUser.html.name: ASAPPUser
Classes/ASAPPUser.html.abstract: Holds configuration information pertaining to the current user session.

Classes/ASAPP.html.name: ASAPP
Classes/ASAPP.html.abstract: The ASAPP class holds references to its various configurable properties and allows you

Classes/ASAPPColors.html.name: ASAPPColors
Classes/ASAPPColors.html.abstract: Configurable colors for various parts of the SDK.

Classes/ASAPPStrings.html.name: ASAPPStrings
Classes/ASAPPStrings.html.abstract: Customizable strings for various parts of the UI.

Classes/ASAPPButtonColors.html.name: ASAPPButtonColors
Classes/ASAPPButtonColors.html.abstract: Used for configuring the styles of a button. For example, assign an instance to ASAPPColors.quickReplyButton.

Classes/ASAPPConfig.html.name: ASAPPConfig
Classes/ASAPPConfig.html.abstract: Configuration for the SDK’s connection to the API.

Classes/ASAPPButton.html.name: ASAPPButton
Classes/ASAPPButton.html.abstract: An ASAPPButton will launch the SDK, showing the view controller based on the configured segue.

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
